title: Packers Draft plans, NFC Crown Draft, 49ers Priorities, Best returners, and Bills atop AFC?
itunes:title: Packers Draft plans, NFC Crown Draft, 49ers Priorities, Best returners, and Bills atop AFC?
description:
This edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Packers draft plans.  Hosts Jane Slater, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Fmr Pro Bowl WR Dante Hall wonder if Aaron Rodgers should be consulted and just how much the team needs a new WR.  The AFC is packed while the NFC isn't so clear, so the table drafts contenders for the NFC Championship Game.  Kyle explains why he isn't a fan of Deebo Samuel scrubbing his social media to send a message.  Plus, Dante delivers his list of best NFL returners before the table weighs in on the Bills chances of topping the AFC next season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
